com.vaadin.addon.charts
Class PointClickEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      com.vaadin.event.ConnectorEvent
          com.vaadin.ui.Component.Event
              com.vaadin.addon.charts.PointClickEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PointClickEvent
extends com.vaadin.ui.Component.Event

The PointClickEvent class stores data for click events on the points of the chart.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getX

public double getX()
Gets the X coordinate of the point that was clicked.

Note, that if the axis type is Date, the value is "unix timestamp" which is shifted to UTF time zone that is used by the client side implementation. If you have used Date object as value, you most likely want to pass the value thru Util.toServerDate(double) method before actually using the value.

Returns:
the X coordinate of the point that was clicked.

getY

public double getY()
Returns:
the Y coordinate of the point that was clicked.

getSeries

public Series getSeries()
Returns:
the series containing the point that was clicked

getCategory

public String getCategory()
Returns:
the name of the category for the point that was clicked.

getPointIndex

public int getPointIndex()
Returns:
the index of the point in its series that was clicked

getAbsoluteX

public int getAbsoluteX()
Returns:
the absolute x position of the clicked point in browser client area in pixels

getAbsoluteY

public int getAbsoluteY()
Returns:
the absolute y position of the clicked point in browser client area in pixels
